analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/29/0x1d5ad663c111d34e95b5d257c78b87d649c61caa.sol#201-203) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/29/0x1d5ad663c111d34e95b5d257c78b87d649c61caa.sol#202-203)

_Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/29/0x1d5ad663c111d34e95b5d257c78b87d649c61caa.sol#305-312) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(owner,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/29/0x1d5ad663c111d34e95b5d257c78b87d649c61caa.sol#310-312)

_Crowdsale.crowdsaleClosed should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0x1d5ad663c111d34e95b5d257c78b87d649c61caa.sol#293-294)
_Crowdsale.fundingGoalReached should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0x1d5ad663c111d34e95b5d257c78b87d649c61caa.sol#293)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/29/0x1d5ad663c111d34e95b5d257c78b87d649c61caa.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.18', '^0.4.19']
	- /unique_chucks/29/0x1d5ad663c111d34e95b5d257c78b87d649c61caa.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18
	- /unique_chucks/29/0x1d5ad663c111d34e95b5d257c78b87d649c61caa.sol#16-19 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18

	- /unique_chucks/29/0x1d5ad663c111d34e95b5d257c78b87d649c61caa.sol#288-289 declares pragma solidity^0.4.19

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/29/0x1d5ad663c111d34e95b5d257c78b87d649c61caa.sol:
